metadata.title: CVE-2024-42307 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:cifs: fix potential null pointer use in destroy_workqueue in init_cifserror pathDan Carpenter reported a Smack static checker warning:   fs/smb/client/cifsfs.c:1981 init_cifs()   error: we previously assumed 'serverclose_wq' could be null (see line1895)The patch which introduced the serverclose workqueue used the wrongoredering in error paths in init_cifs() for freeing it on errors.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
